original_text: You must not be afraid of them, son of man. Do not be afraid of their words either. It may seem that you are living with thorn bushes all around you. You may think that they can hurt you like dangerous scorpions. But do not be afraid of what they say to you, or how they look at you. Remember that they refuse to obey me.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 비록 가시와 찔레와 함께 있으며 전갈 가운데에 거주할지라도 그들을 두려워하지 말고 그들의 말을 두려워하지 말지어다 그들은 패역한 족속이라도 그 말을 두려워하지 말며 그 얼굴을 무서워하지 말지어다

sentences.original_text: You must not be afraid of them
Do not be afraid of their words either
It may seem that you are living with thorn bushes all around you
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 가시덤불 속에 사는 것처럼 보일지도 모른다

sentences.original_text: You may think that they can hurt you like dangerous scorpions
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 위험한 전갈처럼 너를 해칠 수 있다고 생각할지도 모른다

sentences.original_text: But do not be afraid of what they say to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 너에게 하는 말을 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: or how they look at you
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들이 너를 보는 방식도 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Remember that they refuse to obey me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 거부하여 순종하지 않음을 기억하라
